extends javax.swing.JFrame

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void clearStartEndPts()
      Method to clear start and/or end points.
      protected void deleteOneSomaSliceNodeByName(java.lang.String somaSliceNodeName)
      deletes the somaSliceNode from the soma tree model Removes all the connected synapses and required spines
      static java.util.ArrayList<int[]> getAllPrimaryBranchPoints(ntNeuronNode node)
      returns an integer ArrayList of all the primary branch points associate with node
      java.awt.Color getNeuronColorFromNode(ntNeuronNode node, float alpha)
      returns the RGB components of a neuron from a node as a color object If the color returned is white, the node or getNeuronColorFromNodeOriginal(node) function may be null
      java.awt.Color getNeuronColorFromNodeOriginal(ntNeuronNode node)
      returns the RGB components of a neuron from a node original as a color object If the color returned is white, the node may not have any primary branch points
      protected ntNeuronNode getNodeFromNeuronTreeByNodeName(java.lang.String nodeName)
      returns the "nodeName" node in the neuron tree Different implementations will be run depending on whether the node is a neuron root, branch, or soma slice
      protected int getPositionInTracingResultBySynapseName(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> tracingResult, java.lang.String synapseName)
      Returns the position of the synapse in the tracingResult array, by comparing names.
      static ntNeuronNode getSomaNodeFromAllSomaTreeByNeuronNumber(java.lang.String NeuronNumber)
      returns the soma node from the soma tree that corresponds to Neuron Number The input parameter must NOT contain ':' nor '-', otherwise, null will be returned returns null is no such soma exists
      protected static ntNeuronNode getSomaNodeFromNeuronTreeByNeuronNumber(java.lang.String somaName)
      returns the soma node in the neuron tree that somaName refers to If no such soma node exists, return null
      protected ntNeuronNode getTracingNodeByNodeName(java.lang.String nodeName)
      return the "nodeName" tracing node calls getNodeFromNeuronTreeByNodeName(nodeName) if it a branch node calls getSomaSliceNodeFromAllSomaTreeBySomaSliceName(nodeName) if it is a soma slice node returns null if it is a trunck node, soma node, or not a node at all

      set up neuron list tree

      set up spine Tree

      • getTracingNodeByNodeName

        protected ntNeuronNode getTracingNodeByNodeName(java.lang.String nodeName)

        Parameters:
